channel.title: Hexo on osier's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hexo on osier's blog

item.title: Hexo 文章加密
item.description: 插件安装 需要安装 hexo-blog-encrypt 插件，命令如下： 1 $ npm install --save hexo-blog-encrypt 开启加密插件 1 2 3 # Security encrypt: # hexo-blog-encrypt enable: true 给文章加密 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 --- title: Hexo文章加密访问 date: 2019-08-31 password: such a poor dog
